HEADLINE: US Dollar Strength Unleashes Crucial Shifts in Forex Market
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld US Dollar Strength Unleashes Crucial Shifts in Forex Market The US Dollar‚Äôs recent resurgence, marking its first monthly gain this year, has sent palpable ripples across global financial markets. For anyone navigating the complex world of cryptocurrencies, this isn‚Äôt just a distant currency headline; it‚Äôs a crucial signal. A stronger US Dollar strength often correlates with a tougher environment for risk assets like Bitcoin and altcoins, making understanding its underlying drivers paramount. Let‚Äôs delve into what‚Äôs propelling the greenback forward and what it means for your portfolio. Understanding the Recent US Dollar Strength : What‚Äôs Driving It? The US Dollar Index (DXY), which measures the dollar against a basket of six major currencies, has demonstrated remarkable resilience. After a period of weakness, its recent climb signifies a significant shift in market sentiment. But what exactly is fueling this newfound vigor? Interest Rate Differentials: The Federal Reserve‚Äôs aggressive stance on monetary policy, coupled with expectations of further rate hikes, makes dollar-denominated assets more attractive to investors seeking higher yields compared to other major economies. Safe-Haven Appeal: In times of global economic uncertainty or geopolitical tensions, the US Dollar traditionally serves as a safe-haven asset. Investors flock to its perceived stability, pushing its value higher. Economic Resilience: Despite ongoing inflation concerns, the US economy has shown signs of robustness, particularly in the labor market. This relative strength compared to some other developed nations attracts capital inflows. Liquidity: The dollar‚Äôs role as the world‚Äôs primary reserve currency ensures deep liquidity, making it easy for large institutions to move capital in and out, further supporting its demand. Imagine a scenario where global growth concerns are rising, and other major economies face headwinds. In such an environment, the dollar becomes a beacon for capital, drawing funds from less stable regions and boosting its valuation. Jerome Powell Hawkish Tone: A Deep Dive into Fed‚Äôs Stance A primary catalyst for the dollar‚Äôs recent rally has been the unwavering, indeed, Jerome Powell hawkish rhetoric. The Federal Reserve Chair has consistently emphasized the central bank‚Äôs commitment to taming inflation, even if it means prolonged periods of restrictive monetary policy. His recent comments have left little doubt about the Fed‚Äôs resolve. Key takeaways from Powell‚Äôs recent statements include: Inflation Fight Remains Priority: Powell reiterated that inflation remains too high and the Fed is far from declaring victory. He signaled a willingness to keep rates elevated for an extended period to ensure inflation returns to the 2% target. ‚ÄòHigher for Longer‚Äô Narrative: This phrase has become synonymous with the Fed‚Äôs current approach. It suggests that even if rate hikes pause, a quick pivot to rate cuts is unlikely. This prolonged period of high rates supports the dollar. Data-Dependent Decisions: While committed to fighting inflation, Powell stressed that future policy decisions would be data-dependent, implying flexibility but leaning towards continued vigilance. Risks of Easing Prematurely: The Fed Chair has warned against the dangers of easing policy too soon, which could lead to a resurgence of inflationary pressures, necessitating even more aggressive action later. This steadfast commitment to tightening, even as some other central banks show signs of wavering, creates a significant divergence in monetary policy, making the dollar more appealing to global investors. The Ripple Effect: How Interest Rate Hike Expectations Impact Markets The anticipation of continued interest rate hike s by the Federal Reserve sends powerful signals across all asset classes. Higher interest rates in the US have a multifaceted impact: Impact on Currencies: When the Fed raises rates, it increases the yield on dollar-denominated assets like Treasury bonds. This makes the dollar more attractive to foreign investors, increasing demand for the currency and pushing its value up relative to others. This dynamic is clearly visible in pairs like EUR/USD and JPY/USD, where the dollar has gained ground. Impact on Equities: Higher interest rates generally lead to higher borrowing costs for companies, which can squeeze profit margins. This can make equity investments less attractive, especially for growth stocks that rely on future earnings. Furthermore, a stronger dollar can negatively impact the earnings of US multinational corporations that derive a significant portion of their revenue from overseas. Impact on Commodities: Commodities, often priced in US Dollars (e.g., oil, gold), tend to become more expensive for holders of other currencies when the dollar strengthens. This can dampen demand and put downward pressure on commodity prices. Gold, traditionally seen as an inflation hedge, often struggles in a strong dollar, high-interest-rat

HEADLINE: Looking for new crypto to invest in? BPENGU is stealing the spotlight
SUMMARY: Bitcoin may have stumbled below $116,000 after Powell‚Äôs hawkish tone on rates and inflation, but it didn‚Äôt take long for bulls to step back in. The world‚Äôs biggest cryptocurrency is now trading near $118,000‚Äîjust shy of its all-time high‚Äîand investors are once again turning to new altcoins in search of explosive upside. And right now, no project has more buzz‚Äîor a more promising setup‚Äîthan Bitcoin Penguins (BPENGU). The next Pudgy? Bitcoin Penguins brings the heat If you missed out on Pudgy Penguins, Bitcoin Penguins is the project to watch. Drawing clear inspiration from Pudgy‚Äôs viral success and merging it with Bitcoin‚Äôs brand power, BPENGU is positioning itself as the breakout meme coin of the season. But here‚Äôs what makes it different: while Pudgy Penguins took off as a collectable, BPENGU is designed to reward its holders with serious upside. The presale is structured with fixed-stage pricing, rising by 5% at each step. That means early buyers are already sitting on strong paper gains, and those gains will only grow until the August 27 close. Another key factor driving interest is investor behaviour. Crypto traders are constantly seeking the next breakout project, and many who profited from Pudgy Penguins are now scanning the horizon for the next opportunity. Bitcoin Penguins, with its familiar branding and Bitcoin-native architecture, is well-positioned to capture that attention. Even better? The tokenomics are aggressively retail-friendly: only 3% of supply goes to insiders, with the vast majority committed to community, staking, and liquidity. This isn‚Äôt just another hype cycle‚Äîit‚Äôs a carefully designed, high-potential launch with real traction. Why Bitcoin‚Äôs price pullback doesn‚Äôt matter The Fed‚Äôs decision to hold interest rates steady spooked markets briefly, but crypto has already shaken it off. Powell‚Äôs warnings on tariffs and inflation led to a momentary drop in Bitcoin prices, but the quick recovery to $118,000 shows that risk appetite is alive and well. And as rates stay high, more investors are shifting from top-heavy Bitcoin bets into emerging, low-cap plays. Presales are back in favour, and BPENGU is leading that charge. Beyond the presale mechanics, BPENGU is packing serious utility: up to 100% APY staking rewards, a weekly 1 BTC jackpot, and a rapidly expanding community. With a token listing slated for September 2, the runway is short, the price is still low, and the upside is massive. In a market that‚Äôs hungry for the next big narrative, Bitcoin Penguins is checking every box. For those looking for a new crypto to invest in right now, this is one project that doesn‚Äôt just look exciting‚Äîit looks inevitable. The post Looking for new crypto to invest in? BPENGU is stealing the spotlight appeared first on Invezz

HEADLINE: Ethereum Treasury Strategy: BTCS Seeks $2 Billion Raise For Crypto Accumulation
SUMMARY: Ethereum-focused (ETH) blockchain firm BTCS Inc. has unveiled plans to raise up to $2 billion through share sales to expand its cryptocurrency holdings. The move was disclosed in a recent S-3 registration statement filed with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). BTCS To Accumulate More Ethereum? According to a recent S-3 filing with the US financial watchdog, US-based digital assets firm BTCS is eyeing a raise of $2 billion through share sales in a bid to grow its digital assets portfolio and expand operations. Specifically, BTCS aims to sell common shares across multiple offerings, subject to a total offering cap of $2 billion. In the official SEC filing, the company remarked: We intend to use the net proceeds from the sale of the securities by us to provide additional funds for purchasing digital assets, working capital, and other general corporate purposes. In addition to the S-3 filing, BTCS submitted a separate filing for the resale of more than five million shares of common stock related to prior convertible notes and warrants. The firm expects to generate up to $12 million from this offering. BTCS has been steadily increasing its ETH reserves throughout 2025. Most recently, it purchased 14,420 ETH, bringing its total holdings to 70,028 ETH ‚Äì currently valued at around $275 million. According to data from CoinGecko, BTCS ranks fifth among publicly-traded companies with the largest ETH treasuries. BitMine Immersion Technologies tops the list, holding 566,776 ETH on its balance sheet. At the time of writing, BTCS shares recorded a slight pullback, trading 2.6% lower at $4.91. However, the Nasdaq-listed firm is still up almost 100% on a year-to-date (YTD) basis. ETH Accumulation In Full Force While previous years saw corporate giants like Strategy (formerly MicroStrategy), Tesla, and Coinbase amassing Bitcoin (BTC) reserves, 2025 is shaping up to be the year of Ethereum accumulation. Another Nasdaq-listed firm ‚Äì SharpLink Gaming ‚Äì recently acquired 79,949 ETH, expanding its total digital assets reserves to 360,807 ETH. This came after the firm had disclosed plans to spend as much as $5 billion to buy more ETH. Similarly, Bit Digital bought 19,683 ETH last week, using net proceeds from its recently concluded $67.3 million share offering. Another publicly-traded company, GameSquare invested $5 million in ETH as part of corporate treasury strategy. Meanwhile, inflows attracted by spot Ethereum exchange-traded funds (ETFs) continue to increase, recently eclipsing even those recorded by their BTC counterparts. At press time, ETH trades at $3,796, up 0.8% in the past 24 hours.
TAGS: Ethereum|Altcoin|BTCS|crypto|Cryptocurrency|digital asset|ETH|Ethereum Accumulation|ETHUSDT|S-3 Filing|Securities and Exchange Commission|US SEC

HEADLINE: SEC Sets New Crypto ETF Standards, Dozen Major Tokens Could Qualify by October
SUMMARY: The Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has established new listing standards for cryptocurrency exchange-traded products that could clear the path for approximately a dozen major digital assets to gain ETF approval by October. The CBOE filing reveals that any cryptocurrency with futures contracts trading on designated markets for at least six months would automatically qualify for ETP listing under the new Generic Listing Standards framework. The new rule allows an issuer''s shares to be listed on an exchange if the underlying commodity to which exposure is given has a contract on a Designated Contract Market for at least 6 months. pic.twitter.com/zd5rDdCxPg ‚Äî Greg Xethalis (@xethalis) July 30, 2025 CFTC Becomes Crypto ETF Gatekeeper as SEC Shifts Approval Authority The breakthrough comes after months of regulatory uncertainty that saw the SEC both approve and immediately reverse decisions on multi-asset crypto ETFs. Eric Balchunas noted that the eligible tokens include ‚Äú the usual suspects ‚Äù that previously held 85% or higher approval odds, with September and October emerging as the likely approval timeline for pending applications. The SEC''s "Listing Standards" for crypto ETPs is out via new exchange filing. BOTTOM LINE: Any coin that has futures tracking it for >6mo on Coinbase''s derivatives exchange would be approved (below is list). It''s about a dozen of the usual suspects, the same ones we had at 85% or‚Ä¶ https://t.co/QlzZnta7Yv pic.twitter.com/CmBr8XxAcM ‚Äî Eric Balchunas (@EricBalchunas) July 30, 2025 The new standards effectively outsource ETF approval decisions to the Commodity Futures Trading Commission, which oversees futures market designations. The framework requires no specific market capitalization, underlying liquidity, or float percentage requirements, only the existence of qualifying futures contracts. Among the eligible cryptocurrencies are Bitcoin , Ethereum , Solana , XRP , Cardano , Avalanche , Chainlink , Litecoin, Polkadot, Dogecoin , Stellar, and Shiba Inu. Solana ETPs face an October 10 approval deadline, with XRP following shortly after as their respective futures contracts reach the six-month threshold. The developments build on significant momentum in the crypto ETF space. Spot Bitcoin ETFs have accumulated $55.11 billion in cumulative inflows with $151.36 billion in assets under management. Source: SosoValue Ethereum ETFs reached $21.5 billion in assets, representing 4.7% of Ethereum‚Äôs market capitalization, following 19 consecutive days of net inflows totaling over $9 billion. Regulatory Framework Streamlines Approval Process The CBOE‚Äôs Generic Listing Standards filing eliminates the traditional 19b-4 rule change process that previously required individual exchange applications for each crypto ETP. Under the new framework, qualifying products could receive approval after a 75-day review period, dramatically reducing time-to-market for issuers. The SEC voted on July 29 to approve in-kind creation and redemption mechanisms for crypto ETPs, allowing authorized participants to exchange shares for underlying cryptocurrencies rather than cash. The SEC has approved in-kind creations and redemptions for Bitcoin and Ether ETPs, a decision expected to boost efficiency and lower costs in the crypto ETF market. #SEC #CryptoETP https://t.co/lJoF4WXJaG ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 30, 2025 Chairman Paul Atkins emphasized the change would make products ‚Äú less costly and more efficient ‚Äù for investors. The in-kind redemption model provides significant tax advantages for institutional investors by allowing them to defer capital gains until they choose to sell the received cryptocurrencies. Previously, cash-only redemptions forced ETF issuers to sell underlying assets, triggering immediate tax consequences for shareholders. The Commission also approved applications for mixed Bitcoin-Ethereum ETPs and expanded position limits for Bitcoin ETP options to 250,000 contracts. Two scheduling orders were issued seeking public comment on large-cap crypto ETP listings previously approved under delegated authority. Greg Xethalis identified September 17 as a critical date, marking six months after Solana futures launched on CME. Circle September 17 as the date that is 6 months after SOL Futures listed on CME, although they were certified ~ one month sooner on Bitnomial and NADEX (so that could mean earlier approval if GLS is live or if the SEC acts independently on Solana 19b4s). ‚Äî Greg Xethalis (@xethalis) July 30, 2025 However, earlier certification on Bitnomial and NADEX could accelerate approval timelines if the Generic Listing Standards receive final approval or if the SEC acts independently on pending applications. Market Dynamics Signal Institutional Adoption Surge Institutional demand has accelerated despite ongoing regulatory developments. BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT recorded $147.36 million in inflows on July 28 , leading spot Bitcoin ETFs to $157 million in total daily inflows. Ethereum ETFs

HEADLINE: Phoenix Group Unveils Impressive Bitcoin Holdings Growth in Q2
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Phoenix Group Unveils Impressive Bitcoin Holdings Growth in Q2 In the dynamic world of digital assets, institutional adoption continues to be a pivotal driver, signaling a maturing market. Dubai-based Phoenix Group, a prominent name in crypto mining equipment distribution, recently made headlines with a significant expansion of its Bitcoin holdings in the second quarter. This strategic move not only solidified their position as a major player but also highlighted a growing trend among corporations to formalize substantial digital asset treasury strategies. What does this mean for the crypto landscape, and why are companies like Phoenix Group increasingly betting big on assets like Bitcoin and Solana? Phoenix Group‚Äôs Strategic Bitcoin Holdings Expansion ‚Äì A Powerful Statement Phoenix Group‚Äôs latest announcement isn‚Äôt just a mere statistic; it‚Äôs a powerful testament to a meticulously crafted financial strategy. According to a Business Wire press release, the company formalized a staggering $150 million digital asset treasury strategy, signaling a profound, long-term commitment to the crypto space. In Q2 alone, they acquired an impressive 179 Bitcoin, propelling their total Bitcoin holdings to a remarkable 514 BTC. This substantial acquisition places them among a growing cohort of public and private companies embracing digital assets as a core component of their balance sheets. Crucially, their digital asset portfolio extends beyond just Bitcoin; they also hold over 630,000 SOL, showcasing a diversified and forward-thinking approach to their digital treasury. The formalization of this $150 million strategy moves beyond speculative trading. It indicates a structured, long-term investment philosophy, integrating digital assets into their core financial operations. For a company primarily known as a leading distributor of crypto mining equipment, this strategic pivot into direct asset ownership creates a synergistic ecosystem. It allows them to not only facilitate mining operations globally but also directly participate in the appreciation of the very assets their equipment helps to secure. This dual approach could provide a robust hedge against market fluctuations, ensuring profitability across different facets of the crypto economy and sending a strong signal to the market about the company‚Äôs confidence in the enduring value and future growth of digital currencies. Why are Bitcoin Holdings Becoming a Corporate Imperative? The decision by companies like Phoenix Group to accumulate significant Bitcoin holdings isn‚Äôt an isolated incident; it‚Äôs part of a broader, evolving corporate treasury management landscape. For years, traditional corporate treasuries focused primarily on cash, bonds, and other low-yield, stable assets. However, with persistent inflation concerns, negative real interest rates in many traditional markets, and a global search for alternative stores of value, Bitcoin has emerged as a compelling option. What precisely drives this profound shift in corporate financial strategy? Inflation Hedge: Bitcoin‚Äôs strictly limited supply of 21 million coins positions it as a robust hedge against the inflationary pressures eroding fiat currency purchasing power. Companies view it as ‚Äòdigital gold,‚Äô a scarce asset designed to retain value over time. Potential for Appreciation: Despite its inherent volatility, Bitcoin has historically demonstrated unparalleled long-term growth potential. Corporations are increasingly willing to accept short-term price swings for the prospect of significant capital appreciation. Diversification Benefits: Adding cryptocurrencies to a traditional portfolio can offer diversification benefits. Bitcoin‚Äôs often low correlation with traditional asset classes can potentially reduce overall portfolio risk and enhance returns, especially during economic uncertainty. Technological Alignment: Investing in Bitcoin and other digital assets aligns companies with cutting-edge technology and the burgeoning digital economy. It signals innovation and adaptability to stakeholders. First-Mover Advantage: While institutional adoption is accelerating, early movers can establish themselves as leaders in the evolving digital financial landscape. Liquidity and Accessibility: Bitcoin is highly liquid, with a global 24/7 market, making it easy to buy and sell. Maturing infrastructure for institutional access, including secure custody solutions, has reduced operational hurdles. Companies like MicroStrategy have famously adopted Bitcoin as their primary treasury reserve asset, demonstrating a successful model for integrating digital assets into corporate finance. Tesla also made headlines with its significant BTC purchases, further legitimizing the asset class in corporate boardrooms. Beyond Bitcoin: Diversifying Digital Asset Holdings with Solana‚Äôs Strategic Role While Bitcoin often grabs the headlines as the undisputed king of cryptocurrencies and a store of value, Phoenix Group‚Äôs substantial h

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Exchange OKX Releases 33rd Proof of Reserve! Bitcoin and Ethereum Assets Decline! Here Are the Details
SUMMARY: Cryptocurrency exchange OKX released its 33rd proof-of-reserve report dated July 4. According to the report, users'' Bitcoin (BTC) holdings decreased by approximately 3.34% to 116,000 BTC. OKX Releases 33rd Proof of Reserves Report: USDT Increases While BTC and ETH Decline This represents a decrease of 4,035 BTC compared to the previous snapshot dated June 14. Ethereum (ETH) also saw a slight decline. User ETH balances decreased by 0.11% to 1.979 million ETH, representing a total loss of 2,090 ETH. Meanwhile, Tether (USDT) holdings saw a notable increase. Users'' total USDT balances increased by 4.62%, reaching 9.02 billion USDT. This represents a growth of approximately 398 million USDT. OKX aims to increase user trust and maintain transparency through its regular proof-of-reserve reports. The company states that all technical processes are meticulously handled on behalf of users. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: Bitcoin Exchange OKX Releases 33rd Proof of Reserve! Bitcoin and Ethereum Assets Decline! Here Are the Details

HEADLINE: Billionaire Warren Buffett Dumps $1,230,000,000 Stake in Verisign ‚Äì Here Are Two Stocks Berkshire Hathaway Recently Added
SUMMARY: Warren Buffett‚Äôs Berkshire Hathaway has dumped nearly $1.23 billion worth of shares in the domain name giant Verisign. Verisign, an internet infrastructure provider, announced Berkshire‚Äôs sale on Monday, noting the Omaha-based investment giant would sell 4,300,000 shares of the company‚Äôs common stock to the public for¬†$285 per share . Verisign‚Äôs stock, VRSN, is down 3.78% in the past 24 hours and 7.61% in the past five days. The stock is still up 29% in 2025, however. The sell-off materialized after Buffett‚Äôs firm acquired multiple new stocks in the first quarter of 2025. Filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) earlier this year indicated Berkshire added 865,311 shares of the swimming pool supply giant POOLCORP (POOL) for nearly $262 million in Q1. The firm purchased an additional 6,384,676 shares of the alcohol producer Constellation Brands (STZ) for nearly $961 million, and it acquired 238,613 new shares of Domino‚Äôs Pizza (DPZ) worth approximately $204 million. The Omaha-based holding company also bought 112,401 new shares of Heico Corporation (HEI), an aerospace and electronics firm. Those new shares were worth nearly $50 million in Q1. The performance of Berkshire‚Äôs new investments has been mixed in 2025 so far: POOL is down 8.42% on the year and STZ is down 22.42%, while DPZ is up 13.25% year-to-date and HEI is up 36.8%. HEADLINE: Bitcoin‚Äôs Unstoppable Reign: Why Pompliano Crowns It ‚ÄòKing of Wall Street‚Äô
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin‚Äôs Unstoppable Reign: Why Pompliano Crowns It ‚ÄòKing of Wall Street‚Äô In the dynamic world of finance, few assets command attention quite like Bitcoin . What was once considered a niche digital curiosity has undeniably ascended to the forefront of investment conversations, captivating both individual enthusiasts and institutional giants alike. Recently, a powerful declaration from a prominent voice in the crypto space has echoed across financial markets, solidifying Bitcoin‚Äôs burgeoning status. Anthony Pompliano, the insightful founder and CEO of ProCapBTC, didn‚Äôt mince words during a recent CNBC interview, boldly proclaiming that Bitcoin has transitioned from a fringe investment into a widely embraced asset, unequivocally calling it ‚Äúthe king of Wall Street.‚Äù This isn‚Äôt just hyperbole; it‚Äôs a reflection of a profound shift in how the financial world perceives and integrates the leading cryptocurrency. The Coronation: Why Bitcoin is ‚ÄòKing of Wall Street‚Äô Pompliano‚Äôs pronouncement isn‚Äôt made in a vacuum. It stems from a meticulous observation of market trends and economic shifts that highlight Bitcoin‚Äôs superior performance and increasing relevance. His argument is multi-faceted, drawing on critical comparisons with traditional financial benchmarks. The essence of his claim lies in Bitcoin‚Äôs remarkable resilience and appreciation, especially when contrasted with the weakening purchasing power of fiat currencies and the underperformance of conventional equities. Erosion of Fiat Purchasing Power: One of Pompliano‚Äôs key points, as highlighted by Wu Blockchain, is the significant decline in the U.S. dollar‚Äôs purchasing power. Over the past five years, the dollar has reportedly seen a roughly 30% reduction in its value. This erosion means that holding traditional cash assets has resulted in a substantial loss of wealth over time, making a compelling case for alternative stores of value. S&P 500‚Äôs Underperformance Against Bitcoin: Perhaps even more striking is the comparison between the S&P 500, a cornerstone of traditional investment, and Bitcoin. Since 2020, the S&P 500 has plummeted by more than 85% when its performance is measured in Bitcoin. This stark contrast underscores Bitcoin‚Äôs exponential growth and its potential as a superior long-term investment, outshining even the most robust stock market indices. Institutional Embrace: The ‚Äòking‚Äô status isn‚Äôt just about performance; it‚Äôs about acceptance. Wall Street, once skeptical, is now actively integrating Bitcoin. The approval of spot Bitcoin ETFs in the U.S. has opened floodgates for institutional capital, providing regulated and accessible avenues for major players to gain exposure to the digital asset. Decoding the Institutional Embrace: Who‚Äôs Adopting Bitcoin and Why? The journey of Bitcoin from a fringe asset to a Wall Street darling is largely attributed to the growing institutional embrace. This isn‚Äôt a sudden phenomenon but a gradual recognition of Bitcoin‚Äôs unique attributes and its role in a diversified portfolio. But who exactly is adopting Bitcoin, and what are their motivations? Major Players Entering the Bitcoin Arena: The list of institutions exploring or directly investing in Bitcoin is growing. This includes: Asset Managers: Firms like BlackRock, Fidelity, and Grayscale have launched Bitcoin ETFs, allowing their vast client bases to invest in Bitcoin without directly holding the asset. Publicly Traded Corporations: Companies like MicroStrategy have made significant Bitcoin acquisitions, integrating it into their treasury reserves as a hedge against inflation and a growth asset. Hedge Funds and Family Offices: These sophisticated investors are allocating portions of their portfolios to Bitcoin, seeking diversification and asymmetric returns. Payment Processors: Companies like PayPal and Square (Block Inc.) have integrated Bitcoin into their services, making it more accessible for everyday transactions and investment. What are the Driving Forces Behind This Bitcoin Adoption? Several factors are propelling this institutional shift towards Bitcoin: Factor Explanation Inflation Hedge With unprecedented monetary easing and rising inflation concerns globally, institutions view Bitcoin‚Äôs finite supply (21 million coins) as a robust hedge against currency debasement, much like digital gold. Digital Gold Narrative Bitcoin shares characteristics with gold ‚Äì scarcity, divisibility, and portability ‚Äì but offers superior digital transferability and resistance to censorship. It‚Äôs increasingly seen as a modern store of value. Diversification Benefits Bitcoin‚Äôs low correlation with traditional asset classes (stocks, bonds) makes it an attractive tool for portfolio diversification, potentially reducing overall risk while enhancing returns. Technological Innovation Institutions recognize the underlying blockchain technology as a groundbreaking innovation with potential to revolutionize various industries beyond finance, making Bitcoin an early

Payment Processors: Companies like PayPal and Square (Block Inc.) have integrated Bitcoin into their services, making it more accessible for everyday transactions and investment. What are the Driving Forces Behind This Bitcoin Adoption? Several factors are propelling this institutional shift towards Bitcoin: Factor Explanation Inflation Hedge With unprecedented monetary easing and rising inflation concerns globally, institutions view Bitcoin‚Äôs finite supply (21 million coins) as a robust hedge against currency debasement, much like digital gold. Digital Gold Narrative Bitcoin shares characteristics with gold ‚Äì scarcity, divisibility, and portability ‚Äì but offers superior digital transferability and resistance to censorship. It‚Äôs increasingly seen as a modern store of value. Diversification Benefits Bitcoin‚Äôs low correlation with traditional asset classes (stocks, bonds) makes it an attractive tool for portfolio diversification, potentially reducing overall risk while enhancing returns. Technological Innovation Institutions recognize the underlying blockchain technology as a groundbreaking innovation with potential to revolutionize various industries beyond finance, making Bitcoin an early

HEADLINE: Bolivia Calls Crypto ‚ÄòReliable Alternative‚Äô in New El Salvador Partnership Deal
SUMMARY: Bolivia‚Äôs Central Bank has signed a memorandum of understanding with El Salvador‚Äôs National Commission of Digital Assets to promote crypto development, marking a dramatic policy reversal for a nation that previously banned virtual assets and now calls them a ‚Äú reliable alternative ‚Äù to traditional currencies. The cooperation agreement enables mutual information exchange and knowledge sharing on blockchain intelligence tools, risk analysis, and regulatory experiences between both institutions. Source: Press Release Bolivia‚Äôs Virtual Asset Usage Explodes 532% in One Year Bolivia‚Äôs virtual asset usage surged from $46.5 million to $294 million between June 2024 and June 2025 following regulatory changes. Source: Reuters The partnership comes into effect immediately for an indefinite period. This positions Bolivia to benefit from El Salvador‚Äôs pioneering regulatory framework and practical experience as the world‚Äôs first country to adopt Bitcoin as legal tender. El Salvador‚Äôs CNAD has become a fundamental actor in the global digital assets ecosystem. Bolivia‚Äôs embrace of cryptocurrency contrasts sharply with its historical stance, having previously maintained strict prohibitions on virtual assets before implementing Board Resolution 082/2024 in June 2024. The policy shift enables legal use of virtual assets for cross-border transactions and e-commerce payments. The agreement consolidates progress made in establishing digital assets as viable alternatives for families and small entrepreneurs. At the same time, Bolivia‚Äôs Central Bank commits to developing policies that modernize the financial system and deepen financial inclusion through regulated cryptocurrency ecosystems. El Salvador‚Äôs experience provides valuable guidance despite recent International Monetary Fund restrictions that have capped the country‚Äôs Bitcoin purchases and mandated privatization of the state-run Chivo wallet by July 2025. Bolivia‚Äôs Cryptocurrency Revolution Gains Momentum Earlier this year, the Central Bank of Bolivia authorized state oil company YPFB to use cryptocurrency for purchasing crude oil and diesel from international vendors in March 2025. They aimed to address foreign currency shortages that created fuel supply disruptions across the country. President Luis Arce‚Äôs cabinet granted YPFB permission to conduct fuel import deals using either USD or cryptocurrency, with Bolivia requiring at least $60 million weekly for fuel imports. The decree instructs YPFB to make budgetary adjustments covering financial costs within applicable regulations. Bolivia‚Äôs cryptocurrency adoption has accelerated rapidly, with virtual asset transactions exceeding 1.1 million from July to September 2024 , compared to 932,000 in the six months before then. Six financial institutions began operating with virtual assets, reporting 40% growth in operations between July and August. The Central Bank launched educational initiatives, conducting over 33 workshops nationwide, reaching more than 3,000 participants to inform the public about virtual asset characteristics and risks. The legal framework enables Bolivians to use cryptocurrency for cross-border transactions and e-commerce payments. The partnership with El Salvador provides technical expertise for developing secure and regulated cryptocurrency ecosystems. Source: Press Release Bolivia joins a growing number of countries using cryptocurrency for international trade, particularly those seeking alternatives to traditional banking systems amid sanctions or political tensions. El Salvador‚Äôs Bitcoin Model Faces IMF Constraints El Salvador maintains approximately 6,244 Bitcoin worth $742 million despite IMF loan agreement restrictions preventing new government purchases since February 2025. The $1.4 billion loan program requires the country to maintain unchanged Bitcoin holdings and privatize the Chivo wallet. President Nayib Bukele‚Äôs previous claims of daily Bitcoin purchases have been contradicted by IMF documentation confirming no new acquisitions since the loan agreement. On-chain activity showing Bitcoin movements between wallets represents internal transfers rather than fresh purchases. The IMF praised El Salvador‚Äôs updated Bitcoin policy for reducing fiscal risk and strengthening transparency, noting these steps help stabilize inflation and restore macroeconomic stability. However, Bitcoin is no longer considered mandatory legal tender under the agreement. El Salvador‚Äôs Bitcoin experiment appears to be faltering under the weight of an IMF loan agreement and declining public engagement. #IMF #ElSalvador https://t.co/65lADRixOH ‚Äî Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 26, 2025 El Salvador‚Äôs CNAD has consolidated its position as a regional leader in cryptocurrency regulation, promoting innovation, security, and regulatory compliance throughout the digital assets sector. The country‚Äôs regulatory framework remains among the most developed and advanced in promoting virtual assets globally. The My First Bitcoin organi

HEADLINE: Bitcoin and Altcoins Bounce Back After Fed‚Äôs Interest Rate Decision: Market Watch
SUMMARY: Bitcoin‚Äôs price actions went through some volatility yesterday, especially after the conclusion of the latest FOMC meeting, but the asset has managed to recover the losses. Most altcoins are also in the green today, with ETH climbing back toward $3,900 and ENA exploding by double digits once more. BTC Recovers After FOMC Meeting After the correction at the end of the previous business week, which drove BTC to a 14-day low of under $114,500, the primary cryptocurrency managed to recover most losses and even headed toward $120,000 at the beginning of the current one. However, the resistance at that level turned out to be too strong for bitcoin‚Äôs current momentum, and the asset returned to around $118,000 yesterday ahead of the latest FOMC meeting for the year. All eyes turned to the US central bank, especially after the country‚Äôs GDP report for Q2 was significantly higher than expected. However, the Fed refused to change the interest rates, which resulted in some volatility for BTC. Perhaps also driven by the lack of any mention of a strategic bitcoin reserve in the White House‚Äôs digital asset report , which went live yesterday as well, the cryptocurrency dropped by several grand to below $116,000. Nevertheless, it has recovered most losses and challenged $119,000 earlier today. As of now, it remains about $500 away from that level, while its market cap has risen to $2.360 trillion. Its dominance over the alts stands at 59.4% on CG. BTCUSD. Source: TradingView ENA Back on the Run Most altcoins have turned green today after yesterday‚Äôs correction. Ethereum has risen past $3,850 after a 1.5% daily jump, while XRP is back above $3.15 following a similar increase. BNB, SOL, DOGE , ADA, HYPE, and XLM are also in the green. SUI has recovered over 4%, LINK is up by 3%, while HBAR has added 5.7% of value since yesterday. ENA has emerged as the top performer once again, having surged by over 16% to $0.675. The total crypto market cap has added $30 billion overnight and is up to $3.970 trillion on CG. Cryptocurrency Market Overview. Source: QuantifyCrypto The post Bitcoin and Altcoins Bounce Back After Fed‚Äôs Interest Rate Decision: Market Watch appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: Bitcoin Investment: ANAP Holdings‚Äô Bold Move into Crypto
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Investment: ANAP Holdings‚Äô Bold Move into Crypto Imagine your favorite fashion brand making significant moves in the digital asset space. This isn‚Äôt a futuristic fantasy; it‚Äôs today‚Äôs reality. Japanese fashion powerhouse ANAP Holdings has once again turned heads in the financial world with its latest Bitcoin investment , signaling growing confidence among traditional businesses in the decentralized future. ANAP Holdings‚Äô Strategic Bitcoin Investment: A Fashion Statement? Japanese fashion brand ANAP Holdings recently announced another substantial acquisition of Bitcoin, adding 16.9786 BTC to its reserves. This elevates ANAP‚Äôs total Bitcoin holdings to an impressive 831.1191 BTC. For a company known for trendy apparel, this consistent accumulation speaks volumes about its long-term vision and belief in digital assets. This isn‚Äôt ANAP‚Äôs first foray into the Bitcoin market. The company has steadily built its crypto treasury, with a clear ambition to acquire over 1,000 BTC by August. This aggressive target highlights a profound commitment to Bitcoin as a core component of their financial strategy, moving beyond traditional fiat assets. What compels a fashion brand to make such a significant Bitcoin investment ? It‚Äôs a tangible example of how companies view Bitcoin not merely as speculative, but as a legitimate store of value and a strategic hedge against economic uncertainties. Why Are Companies Like ANAP Making a Bitcoin Investment? Traditional corporate treasury strategies are evolving. Factors like inflation, negative real interest rates, and geopolitical instability push companies to explore alternatives. Bitcoin, with its decentralized nature, finite supply, and growing institutional acceptance, offers a compelling option. Key reasons for a substantial Bitcoin investment : Inflation Hedge: Bitcoin‚Äôs capped supply (21 million coins) makes it an attractive hedge against inflation and currency debasement, preserving purchasing power. Potential for Appreciation: Despite volatility, Bitcoin shows significant long-term growth. Companies aim for substantial returns on idle cash. Diversification: Bitcoin diversifies a treasury portfolio, potentially reducing overall risk by adding an uncorrelated asset class. Technological Alignment: Investing in Bitcoin signals innovation, enhancing brand image and appealing to tech-savvy consumers. Navigating the Challenges of Corporate Bitcoin Investment: What Are the Risks? While benefits are compelling, corporate Bitcoin investment has challenges. Companies must carefully weigh these factors: Price Volatility: Bitcoin‚Äôs swings offer opportunities but also risks of substantial losses, impacting financial statements. Regulatory Uncertainty: Evolving regulations across jurisdictions can affect legality, tax treatment, or operations. Security Concerns: Storing large amounts of Bitcoin requires robust security to prevent hacks or loss of keys. Accounting Complexities: Bitcoin‚Äôs intangible asset classification can lead to non-cash impairment charges if prices drop. ANAP‚Äôs steady increase suggests they manage these risks, viewing them as acceptable trade-offs for long-term benefits. Pioneers of Corporate Bitcoin Investment: Who Else is Leading the Charge? ANAP Holdings joins a growing cohort of public companies adding Bitcoin to their balance sheets. MicroStrategy, led by Michael Saylor, famously spearheaded this trend, adopting Bitcoin as their primary treasury reserve asset. Other notable examples include: Tesla: The EV giant made a significant Bitcoin investment in early 2021, legitimizing Bitcoin for many mainstream investors. Block (formerly Square): Jack Dorsey‚Äôs payments company not only holds Bitcoin but integrates it into Cash App, allowing users to buy, sell, and store it. These pioneers demonstrate the feasibility and potential benefits for companies of various sizes and industries to incorporate Bitcoin. ANAP‚Äôs entry from the fashion sector broadens this corporate trend‚Äôs appeal. The Future of Corporate Bitcoin Investment: What Does ANAP‚Äôs Move Signify? ANAP‚Äôs ambitious Bitcoin investment strategy is a powerful signal. It suggests corporate adoption of digital assets is a fundamental shift in how businesses manage financial resources. As more companies see benefits and ecosystem maturity, a snowball effect is possible. This trend could lead to: Increased Mainstream Acceptance: Companies embracing Bitcoin normalize its status, reducing skepticism. New Financial Products: Corporate demand will spur innovation in traditional finance. Greater Regulatory Clarity: Growing corporate adoption compels clearer government guidelines. ANAP‚Äôs commitment to 1,000 BTC by August is a bold statement. It shows conviction that Bitcoin is a viable, strategic asset for established businesses to future-proof their balance sheets in an unpredictable global economy. Conclusion: Fashioning a Future with Bitcoin ANAP Holdings‚Äô expanding Bitcoin investment portfolio is a compel

HEADLINE: Explosive Altcoin Market: Futures Trading Volume Surges to Five-Month High
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Explosive Altcoin Market: Futures Trading Volume Surges to Five-Month High Are you feeling the buzz in the cryptocurrency world? If so, you‚Äôre not alone. The digital asset space is currently witnessing a phenomenal shift, with the altcoin market taking center stage. Following Bitcoin‚Äôs impressive rally to around $120,000, it appears that the spotlight has firmly turned towards alternative cryptocurrencies, often referred to as altcoins. This isn‚Äôt just a ripple; it‚Äôs a wave, with on-chain analytics platform CryptoQuant reporting a significant surge in trading activity, particularly within the perpetual futures segment. What‚Äôs Fueling the Altcoin Market Frenzy? The latest data from CryptoQuant, shared on X, paints a compelling picture: altcoins are gaining substantial momentum. This isn‚Äôt just anecdotal observation; the numbers speak volumes. Trading activity in the altcoin market , especially in perpetual futures contracts, has seen a remarkable uptick. But what exactly does this surge entail, and why is it so significant? The combined trading volume for Ethereum (ETH) and other altcoin perpetual contracts has soared to an astonishing $223.6 billion. To put this into perspective, this figure represents the highest volume recorded in five months. Even more striking is that this massive volume now constitutes 83% of the total trading volume across centralized exchanges. This dominance clearly indicates a shift in trader focus and capital allocation. Bitcoin‚Äôs Precedent: Bitcoin‚Äôs strong performance often acts as a catalyst, pulling the broader crypto market, including altcoins, upwards. Its recent surge has instilled confidence, prompting traders to explore higher-beta assets. Search for Alpha: After Bitcoin‚Äôs initial run, many traders look to altcoins for potentially larger percentage gains, leveraging their inherent volatility. Narrative-Driven Cycles: Specific narratives within the altcoin space, such as Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Artificial Intelligence (AI), or Real World Assets (RWAs), can ignite significant interest and trading volume in related projects. Why Are Perpetual Futures So Important for the Altcoin Market? Perpetual futures are a type of derivative contract that allows traders to speculate on the future price of an asset without owning the underlying asset. Unlike traditional futures, they don‚Äôt have an expiry date, making them popular for continuous speculation. Their surge in the altcoin market signifies several key trends: Increased Speculation: A high volume in perpetual futures indicates aggressive speculative activity. Traders are actively taking leveraged positions, betting on significant price movements in altcoins. Enhanced Liquidity: The influx of trading volume provides deeper liquidity to the altcoin futures market, making it easier for large orders to be executed without significant price slippage. Broader Participation: The accessibility of perpetual futures on centralized exchanges attracts a wide range of participants, from retail traders to institutional players, all seeking to capitalize on altcoin volatility. Market Sentiment Indicator: High open interest and trading volume in perpetual futures can be a strong indicator of bullish sentiment, as traders are willing to take on more risk for potential gains. Conversely, a sudden drop could signal a shift in sentiment. Is This Sustainable? Understanding the Benefits and Challenges of the Altcoin Market Boom The current momentum in the altcoin market presents both exciting opportunities and inherent risks. Understanding these aspects is crucial for anyone looking to navigate this dynamic environment. Benefits: High Growth Potential: Altcoins, especially smaller cap projects, can offer exponential returns compared to more established cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum. Diversification: Investing in a diversified portfolio of altcoins can help spread risk and capture growth from various sectors within the crypto ecosystem. Innovation Exposure: Altcoins represent the cutting edge of blockchain technology, offering exposure to new applications, protocols, and use cases that could revolutionize various industries. Challenges: Extreme Volatility: While offering high returns, altcoins are notoriously volatile. Prices can swing wildly, leading to significant gains or losses in short periods. Liquidation Risk (in Futures): Trading perpetual futures involves leverage, which amplifies both gains and losses. Incorrect predictions can lead to rapid liquidations, wiping out an entire position. Rug Pulls and Scams: The altcoin space, particularly newer or lesser-known projects, is susceptible to scams and ‚Äòrug pulls,‚Äô where developers abandon a project and disappear with investor funds. Regulatory Uncertainty: The evolving regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies can impact altcoin projects, potentially leading to delistings or operational challenges. Actionable Insights: Navigating the Altc

Enhanced Liquidity: The influx of trading volume provides deeper liquidity to the altcoin futures market, making it easier for large orders to be executed without significant price slippage. Broader Participation: The accessibility of perpetual futures on centralized exchanges attracts a wide range of participants, from retail traders to institutional players, all seeking to capitalize on altcoin volatility. Market Sentiment Indicator: High open interest and trading volume in perpetual futures can be a strong indicator of bullish sentiment, as traders are willing to take on more risk for potential gains. Conversely, a sudden drop could signal a shift in sentiment. Is This Sustainable? Understanding the Benefits and Challenges of the Altcoin Market Boom The current momentum in the altcoin market presents both exciting opportunities and inherent risks. Understanding these aspects is crucial for anyone looking to navigate this dynamic environment. Benefits: High Growth Potential: Altcoins, especially smaller cap projects, can offer exponential returns compared to more established cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum. Diversification: Investing in a diversified portfolio of altcoins can help spread risk and capture growth from various sectors within the crypto ecosystem. Innovation Exposure: Altcoins represent the cutting edge of blockchain technology, offering exposure to new applications, protocols, and use cases that could revolutionize various industries. Challenges: Extreme Volatility: While offering high returns, altcoins are notoriously volatile. Prices can swing wildly, leading to significant gains or losses in short periods. Liquidation Risk (in Futures): Trading perpetual futures involves leverage, which amplifies both gains and losses. Incorrect predictions can lead to rapid liquidations, wiping out an entire position. Rug Pulls and Scams: The altcoin space, particularly newer or lesser-known projects, is susceptible to scams and ‚Äòrug pulls,‚Äô where developers abandon a project and disappear with investor funds. Regulatory Uncertainty: The evolving regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies can impact altcoin projects, potentially leading to delistings or operational challenges. Actionable Insights: Navigating the Altc

HEADLINE: Crucial Update: Binance RUNE Suspension for Essential THORChain Network Upgrade
SUMMARY: BitcoinWorld Crucial Update: Binance RUNE Suspension for Essential THORChain Network Upgrade In the fast-paced world of cryptocurrency, staying informed about exchange announcements is crucial for every investor and trader. A significant development has just emerged concerning THORChain (RUNE) holders on Binance. The global crypto exchange giant, Binance, has announced a temporary Binance RUNE suspension of deposits and withdrawals for the THORChain network. This move, scheduled for July 31st, 2024, at 17:00 UTC, is in direct support of an upcoming, vital upgrade to the THORChain network. Understanding the implications of this suspension and what steps to take is paramount for ensuring your assets remain secure and accessible. Understanding the Binance RUNE Suspension : What‚Äôs Happening? Binance, one of the world‚Äôs leading cryptocurrency exchanges, recently issued an official notice detailing its plans to halt all RUNE transactions on its platform. This isn‚Äôt an arbitrary decision but a standard procedure undertaken by exchanges to ensure the smooth and secure transition during significant blockchain network upgrades. The temporary Binance RUNE suspension specifically targets deposits and withdrawals of the THORChain network‚Äôs native token, RUNE. The announcement specifies that the suspension will commence precisely on July 31, 2024, at 17:00 UTC . While the exact duration of the suspension has not been explicitly stated beyond the commencement time, such halts typically last until the network upgrade is successfully completed and the network‚Äôs stability is verified. Users are advised to closely monitor Binance‚Äôs official announcements for updates regarding the resumption of services. Why do exchanges implement such measures? There are several key reasons: Data Integrity: To prevent any potential loss or corruption of user funds during the upgrade process, which often involves significant changes to the blockchain‚Äôs underlying architecture. Smooth Transition: To ensure that all transactions are accurately recorded on the new, upgraded chain, avoiding discrepancies or forks that could lead to confusion or financial losses. Security: Upgrades can sometimes expose temporary vulnerabilities. Suspending services minimizes the risk of exploitation during these critical periods. Compliance: Ensuring the exchange‚Äôs systems are fully compatible with the upgraded network‚Äôs protocols. This proactive step by Binance underscores its commitment to user security and the overall health of the THORChain ecosystem. It‚Äôs a testament to responsible exchange management, prioritizing the long-term stability of the assets it supports. What is THORChain (RUNE) and Why is This Upgrade Important? For those new to the space, THORChain (RUNE) stands as a groundbreaking decentralized liquidity protocol that enables seamless, non-custodial cross-chain swaps. Unlike traditional centralized exchanges, THORChain allows users to exchange native cryptocurrencies (like Bitcoin, Ethereum, BNB, and RUNE itself) directly between different blockchains without wrapping or bridging assets. This functionality is powered by its native utility token, RUNE, which is used for security, governance, and as a settlement asset within the network. Network upgrades are the lifeblood of any evolving blockchain project. They are essential for introducing new features, improving scalability, enhancing security, and fixing bugs. For THORChain, an upgrade can mean: Increased Efficiency: Faster transaction processing times and lower fees. Enhanced Security: Strengthening the network‚Äôs resilience against potential attacks. New Capabilities: Introduction of innovative functionalities that expand THORChain‚Äôs utility and appeal. Scalability Improvements: Preparing the network to handle a larger volume of transactions and users. While specific details of this particular THORChain upgrade have not been fully disclosed by Binance in their suspension notice, the very act of an exchange halting services for it signifies its importance. Such upgrades are critical for the long-term viability and competitiveness of decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols like THORChain. For RUNE holders, a successful upgrade typically translates to a more robust, secure, and valuable network, potentially leading to increased adoption and utility for their assets. Actionable Insights for RUNE Holders: What Should You Do Amidst the Binance RUNE Suspension ? If you hold RUNE on Binance or plan to interact with the THORChain network, this announcement requires your immediate attention. Here are some actionable steps and considerations: Avoid Transactions: Absolutely refrain from initiating any RUNE deposits or withdrawals on Binance from July 31, 2024, 17:00 UTC, until Binance officially announces the resumption of these services. Any attempts during this period may result in the loss of your funds or significant delays. Monitor Official Channels: Regularly check Binance‚Äôs official announcements pa

HEADLINE: Ethereum Defies Correction Calls as Analysts Eye $5,000 Target by August
SUMMARY: Ethereum is holding on to recent gains and is not showing any signs of a short-term correction yet. The asset is currently moving toward the upper bands of its two-week range-bound channel and could break out soon. ‚ÄúI think I‚Äôm wrong about ETH getting some short-term downside,‚Äù crypto analyst ‚ÄòByzantine General‚Äô told his 236,000 X followers on Wednesday. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs too strong and refuses to print any significant correction,‚Äù they added, noting that derivatives funding rates were going negative. Funding rates are periodic payments between traders in perpetual futures contracts to keep the contract price aligned with the underlying asset‚Äôs spot price. When funding rates go below baseline, it usually indicates bearish market sentiment as more traders are short than long, creating an imbalance, but this doesn‚Äôt seem to be happening with ETH. I think I‚Äôm wrong about $ETH getting some short term downside. It‚Äôs too strong, refuses to print any significant correction, funding now going below baseline too. It‚Äôs looking like a just fucking send it moment. pic.twitter.com/IAEBcC5rnT ‚Äî Byzantine General (@ByzGeneral) July 30, 2025 ETH to $5,000 in August? Founder and CEO of ITC Crypto, Benjamin Cowen, zoomed out, noting the previous rejections at $4,000 in 2024 and saying that Ether needed to ‚Äúgo home‚Äù or crash back to bear market levels, which it did in April 2025. Now that the big dump has happened, ETH should break $4,000 this time around, he said. Cowen has predicted that the asset will trade in a realistic range of $5,700 to $7,500 for new all-time highs this cycle. Meanwhile, ‚ÄòCrypto GEMs‚Äô predicted that ETH would reach $5,000 by the end of August. This month of the bull market year (the one after the Bitcoin halving) has been historically good for Ether. Super complex technical analysis for Ethereum pic.twitter.com/k4eSLlxuD3 ‚Äî Benjamin Cowen (@intocryptoverse) July 31, 2025 ‚ÄòCrypto Xlarge‚Äô observed that Ethereum is currently testing the major $3,900 weekly resistance zone. They added that RSI is still not in overbought territory, the post-2021 all-time high breakout structure looks much healthier, and the downtrend has already been broken with a successful retest. The Ethereum community celebrated Ethereum‚Äôs 10th anniversary by ringing the closing bell at NASDAQ on Wednesday. ‚ÄúWe worked to seed a new ecosystem and onboard TradFi to DeFi, with a mission to rebuild the global financial system. And together, we‚Äôre doing it,‚Äù said Ethereum co-founder Joseph Lubin. ETH Price Outlook Ether has gained 1.2% on the day to reach $3,860 during the Thursday morning Asian trading session. However, this resistance level has been approached twice before over the past week, proving too strong. Institutions continue to accumulate the asset with spot Ether ETFs equalling their record 19-day inflow streak and corporate treasury firms purchasing more ETH . Donald Trump‚Äôs son Eric gave another endorsement when it was pointed out that ETH was up 36% since his first one. https://t.co/q5fIKusui6 ‚Äî Eric Trump (@EricTrump) July 29, 2025 The post Ethereum Defies Correction Calls as Analysts Eye $5,000 Target by August appeared first on CryptoPotato .

HEADLINE: Is Mutuum Finance (MUTM) the Hidden Winner At $0.035 While Bitcoin (BTC) Flatlines Near $119K for a Third Straight Day?
SUMMARY: While Bitcoin (BTC) remains stuck in a consolidation phase near the $119,000 mark for several consecutive days, the spotlight is quietly shifting to an under-the-radar DeFi contender‚ÄîMutuum Finance (MUTM). Priced at just $0.035 in its ongoing Phase 6 presale, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is gaining strong momentum among investors who are now actively looking beyond traditional blue-chip cryptocurrencies. What makes this protocol stand out isn‚Äôt price alone‚Äîit‚Äôs the well-structured, utility-driven ecosystem that backs the MUTM token with real DeFi mechanics and tangible value generation. Bitcoin (BTC) Flatlines for a Third Straight Day Bitcoin (BTC) has remained stagnant near $119,000 for three consecutive days, trading at ~$118,421 with a 0.39% 24-hour decline, as per CoinMarketCap data. Despite record ETF inflows exceeding $55 billion, including $157.02 million recently, BTC struggles to break the $120,000 resistance, with support at $116,000. On-chain data shows 40,000 BTC ($4.7B) flowed to exchanges recently, signaling profit-taking, while miners‚Äô revenue pressures (MPI at 2.78) add headwinds. A symmetrical triangle pattern on the 4-hour chart suggests a potential breakout, but low 7-day volatility (1.34%) indicates indecision. Institutional demand, driven by BlackRock‚Äôs IBIT ($20B+), remains robust, yet macro uncertainty from U.S.-China trade talks and a neutral Altcoin Season Index (51) dampen momentum. A break above $119,500 could target $122,000, but failure may see a dip to $112,000. Mutuum Finance (MUTM): Building During Bitcoin‚Äôs Pause Bitcoin‚Äôs stability in the short term might signal uncertainty, but while large-cap assets consolidate, projects like Mutuum Finance (MUTM) are building from the ground up. The platform is not just a simple lending protocol‚Äîit represents a shift toward decentralized finance infrastructure that combines borrowing, lending, passive earnings, and native stablecoin integration within one framework. This makes it an ecosystem, not just a token. Mutuum Finance (MUTM)‚Äôs unique Pooled-to-Contract (P2C) lending model enables users to deposit assets such as USDT, DAI, ETH, or BTC and receive mtTokens, which serve as interest-bearing tokens representing their share in the lending pool. These mtTokens automatically increase in value based on real-time pool utilization. Users can then stake these mtTokens in dedicated smart contracts to earn additional MUTM rewards‚Äîrewards that are consistently bought back from the open market using the platform‚Äôs revenue. This closed-loop reward system avoids inflation and aligns the interests of both protocol users and token holders. Meanwhile, the borrowing side offers overcollateralized loans using stable or blue-chip assets. For example, a borrower depositing $10,000 in ETH at a 60% Loan-to-Value (LTV) ratio would receive $6,000 in liquidity‚Äîwithout having to sell their ETH. This model enables users to retain their asset exposure while accessing capital, a key incentive during sideways or bullish markets. Lenders, in turn, benefit from competitive APYs reaching 10‚Äì12%, especially during high utilization periods. For those seeking higher risk-reward strategies, Mutuum Finance (MUTM) also introduces Peer-to-Peer (P2P) lending. This secondary model allows lenders to negotiate terms directly with borrowers‚Äîespecially useful for newer or riskier memecoins like DOGE, FLOKI, TRUMP. While it‚Äôs not the protocol‚Äôs core feature, it adds optionality for experienced users and demonstrates how the ecosystem is engineered for diverse DeFi participants. Security-conscious investors will also take note of the project‚Äôs CertiK audit, boasting a Token Security Score of 95 and Skynet rating of 78‚Äîdemonstrating transparency and a commitment to protocol integrity. Moreover, the team is actively encouraging public participation with a $50,000 bug bounty program, while marketing efforts are being reinforced through a $100,000 giveaway , where ten winners will receive $10,000 worth of MUTM tokens. The Numbers That Matter Mutuum Finance (MUTM) is currently in Phase 6 of its presale, offering tokens at $0.035. So far, the project has already raised $13.8 million, with 14,700+ unique holders participating in the early rounds. As demand continues to build, the token price is set to increase by 15% to $0.040 in Phase 7. This rapid accumulation signals growing confidence in the platform, especially from users who are looking for strong upside potential rather than waiting for another BTC rally. The total token supply is 4 billion MUTM, and at a planned listing price of $0.06, those who got in at Phase 1 ($0.01) would be looking at 6x returns, while even current Phase 6 buyers at $0.035 could be eyeing a solid 70% upside before listing. However, internal projections are significantly more ambitious. Analysts covering this presale have floated future price targets as high as $1.50, which would imply over 42x growth from the current entry point. Add to this a growing social base,

HEADLINE: White House Crypto Policy Report Looms: What It Means for Bitcoin and XRP Whales
SUMMARY: The crypto world is holding its breath as the White House prepares to release its first comprehensive cryptocurrency policy report on July 30, 2025, including an important section on Bitcoin and XRP. Dubbed a ‚Äúregulatory Bible‚Äù by insiders, the report stems from President Trump‚Äôs Executive Order 14178 and aims to provide sweeping guidance on digital asset oversight, stablecoin rules, and national security concerns. Chaired by Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, with key contributions from SEC Chair Paul Atkins and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick, the President‚Äôs Working Group on Digital Asset Markets has spent the last six months drafting what could become the foundation for U.S. crypto regulation for years to come. With growing political interest and pending crypto bills in Congress, this policy release is expected to influence not just lawmaking, but also market sentiment, especially around Bitcoin (BTC) and XRP. Strategic Bitcoin Reserves and Government Holdings A highly anticipated section of the report will focus on the U.S. government‚Äôs Bitcoin holdings, rumored to be around 198,000 BTC, worth over $23 billion. However, Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) disclosures suggest that only 28,988 BTC may currently be under federal control. The report may also outline a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve strategy, first proposed by Trump in March, possibly indicating budget-neutral methods to accumulate more BTC. If confirmed, this move could influence global crypto adoption and attract more institutional investment. XRP Whales Bet Big Ahead of Policy Reveal Meanwhile, XRP whales have opened $25 million in long positions, anticipating favorable U.S. policy for domestically-rooted digital assets. Technical analysts cite a bullish pennant pattern with upside potential to $5.96 if current momentum holds. The convergence of regulatory clarity, potential reserve accumulation, and strategic legislation may push Bitcoin past $123,000 and ignite an XRP rally, marking the start of a new era in U.S. crypto policy and market behavior. As crypto markets await today‚Äôs 2:30 p.m. briefing, traders, investors, and regulators are aligned in anticipation of what could be a turning point for digital asset adoption in the U.S. Cover image from Unsplash, chart from Tradingview

Dubbed a ‚Äúregulatory Bible‚Äù by insiders, the report stems from President Trump‚Äôs Executive Order 14178 and aims to provide sweeping guidance on digital asset oversight, stablecoin rules, and national security concerns. Chaired by Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent, with key contributions from SEC Chair Paul Atkins and Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick, the President‚Äôs Working Group on Digital Asset Markets has spent the last six months drafting what could become the foundation for U.S. crypto regulation for years to come. With growing political interest and pending crypto bills in Congress, this policy release is expected to influence not just lawmaking, but also market sentiment, especially around Bitcoin (BTC) and XRP. Strategic Bitcoin Reserves and Government Holdings A highly anticipated section of the report will focus on the U.S. government‚Äôs Bitcoin holdings, rumored to be around 198,000 BTC, worth over $23 billion. However, Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) disclosures suggest that only 28,988 BTC may currently be under federal control. The report may also outline a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve strategy, first proposed by Trump in March, possibly indicating budget-neutral methods to accumulate more BTC. If confirmed, this move could influence global crypto adoption and attract more institutional investment. XRP Whales Bet Big Ahead of Policy Reveal Meanwhile, XRP whales have opened $25 million in long positions, anticipating favorable U.S. policy for domestically-rooted digital assets. Technical analysts cite a bullish pennant pattern with upside potential to $5.96 if current momentum holds. The convergence of regulatory clarity, potential reserve accumulation, and strategic legislation may push Bitcoin past $123,000 and ignite an XRP rally, marking the start of a new era in U.S. crypto policy and market behavior. As crypto markets await today‚Äôs 2:30 p.m. briefing, traders, investors, and regulators are aligned in anticipation of what could be a turning point for digital asset adoption in the U.S. Cover image from Unsplash, chart from Tradingview

HEADLINE: Five ancient miner wallets reawakened, consolidating their 50 BTC
SUMMARY: Ancient wallets keep moving their coins, as BTC easily trades near its all-time high. Five notable miner wallets from 2010 moved 250 BTC in the past day. BTC from 2010 moved from miner wallets, showing not all inactive holders lead to lost coins. A total of five early wallets moved 250 Bitcoin, becoming a part of the trend for old coins to be shifted around or sold. The five miner wallets probably belonged to the same individual, as they were consolidated in two new addresses. One of the new wallets contained over $11M, while the other wallet held 150 BTC valued at over $17.7M. The coins were mined when market prices were under $0.10. All the block rewards were received on the same day, during the time when Satoshi Nakamoto was also producing blocks. The miner moved the coins as Bitcoin recovered above $118,000, with still robust spot demand. Whales have proven to be long-term holders, but also ready to take profits at the market peak. Previously, miners were awakened from dormancy during the late 2024 market rally, with one ancient whale sending 50 BTC directly to Binance. Bitcoin moves from untouched block rewards The Bitcoin moved all came from untouched block rewards of 50 coins, received on April 2010. The wallets come from the Satoshi era, mined at a much lower difficulty and minimal electricity expenses. 5 miner wallets woke up after being dormant for over 15 years and transferred 250 $BTC ($29.6M) out an hour ago. These miner wallets earned 50 $BTC each from mining on Apr 26, 2010. Wallets: 1NuqAKeX6JzW372QfEe7eFkewFx21fnqd3 12EWRT19v2eAvWjGDWjodCe7NP1CzmFphT‚Ä¶ pic.twitter.com/vGttaE6MxY ‚Äî Lookonchain (@lookonchain) July 31, 2025 As with other addresses from before 2011, the wallets in question were dusted with an op_return transaction, issuing a pseudo-legal claim on the coins. While the attack is unable to really establish ownership over the coins, the transactions seem to have become a trigger for securing the ancient coins into new addresses. The recent miner selling arrived just a day after another ancient investor moved 3,963 BTC . The relatively small amounts of coins are not able to affect the market, which recently absorbed sales of 80K BTC without crashing the price. However, old miner coins with no history may be valuable to treasuries. Small-scale treasury buyers can join the top 100 of corporate holders with as low as 29 Bitcoin, meaning even a few older BTC can help create the basis for reserves with provable origin. Miner reserves turn lower on profit-taking Prominent mining companies often retain their coins, forming an organic treasury. Big-scale entities like Mara Holdings have expanded their wallets above 50,000 BTC. Overall, miners decreased their reserves from 1.9M Bitcoin down to 1.8M, based on Cryptoquant data . Despite this, hashrate remains high, barring seasonal fluctuations due to low hydroelectric power resources. Based on the hash ribbon indicator, miners are producing blocks very close to distress conditions. This time, there is no clear miner capitulation, but some are taking profits to make use of the low production price of their older BTC. The selling may also be a part of the pivot to AI data centers, which some of the biggest mining companies have taken up. The Bitcoin hashrate is back above 915 EH/s, with difficulty near its all-time high. Mining remains extremely competitive, though companies are still ready to build mining facilities for their own use, or to lend hashrate. HEADLINE: PowerBank and Intellistake Announce Strategic Alliance to Pioneer Digital Currencies, including Bitcoin Treasury Integration and RWA Tokenization
SUMMARY: Highlights of the Partnership: Digital Currency Treasury Program: PowerBank will accumulate Bitcoin and Intellistake will accumulate digital currencies that support decentralized AI. . Bitcoin Treasury Management : Intellistake will help manage digital asset operations for PowerBank and serve as PowerBank''s supporting partner for security, custody, and treasury management. Tokenized Energy Assets : Potential for First-of-their-kind tokens backed by RWA including solar and storage infrastructure. VANCOUVER, BRITISH COLUMBIA July 31, 2025 ‚Äì POWERBANK CORPORATION (NASDAQ: SUUN; Cboe CA: SUNN, FSE: 103) (‚Äú PowerBank ‚Äù or the " Company ")¬†‚Äì announces a transaction with Intellistake Technologies Corp. (‚Äú Intellistake ‚Äù) that involves the intersection of digital assets, energy, and tokenized finance. Intellistake (CSE: ISTK) is a technology company bridging traditional capital markets with decentralized AI and blockchain infrastructure, and PowerBank (formerly SolarBank), is a leader in clean energy infrastructure. Together, these two high-growth companies will pursue three seminal initiatives : A Digital Asset Treasury Program: Leveraging Bitcoin as a long-term treasury reserve asset, PowerBank, with Intellistake‚Äôs support, intends to accumulate and hold Bitcoin on its balance sheet and Intellistake intends to accumulate digital assets that support decentralized AI, such as FET Token ‚Äî aligning with the global shift toward decentralized financial reserves. Bitcoin Treasury Management: Under the partnership framework, Intellistake will help manage digital asset operations for PowerBank and serve as PowerBank''s supporting partner for security, custody, and treasury management of Bitcoin. The Tokenization of Real-World Assets (RWA) : Intellistake and PowerBank are evaluating the potential tokenization of PowerBank‚Äôs clean energy assets or shares ‚Äî providing an investment and financing alternative. ‚ÄúTokenization is no longer a concept‚Äîit‚Äôs an inevitability,‚Äù¬†said Jason Dussault, CEO of Intellistake .¬†‚ÄúBy combining our expertise in capital markets and digital asset custody with PowerBank‚Äôs scalable, real-world energy platform, we‚Äôre unlocking a new opportunity..‚Äù As institutions and sovereign funds increasingly embrace tokenized securities and decentralized asset strategies, the Intellistake‚ÄìPowerBank partnership centres on transforming legacy energy systems into a tokenized product. According to a recent report by CryptoSlate, analysts forecast that the market cap for tokenized real-world assets (RWAs) could reach $30 trillion by 2034(1)‚Äîdriven by advances in blockchain, AI, and investor demand for transparent, real-time asset ownership and settlement. ‚ÄúThis partnership is about more than collaboration‚Äîit‚Äôs about setting the pace for a shift in how companies manage capital and assets,‚Äù¬†said Dr.¬†Richard Lu, CEO of PowerBank .¬†‚ÄúAs the world accelerates toward AI, automation, and clean energy, Bitcoin and tokenization are presenting new opportunities. PowerBank and Intellistake are here to take part in that transformation, to bridge traditional energy infrastructure with the demand of the digital economy.‚Äù Intellistake and PowerBank are presently evaluating the regulatory framework for tokenization. Any tokenization will be subject to it being completed in compliance with applicable law, regulatory requirements and terms of any underlying agreements associated with PowerBank assets. The actual structure of such tokenization, the assets that would be subject to tokenization, and the associated timeline, have not yet been determined. Intellistake and PowerBank will provide further updates as material developments related to this tokenization strategy occur. The actual timing and value of Bitcoin purchases, under the allocation strategy will be determined by management. Purchases will also depend on several factors, including, among others, general market and business conditions, the trading price of Bitcoin and the anticipated cash needs of Intellistake or PowerBank. The allocation strategy may be suspended, discontinued or modified at any time for any reason. Intellistake will support PowerBank‚Äôs establishment of custody for its digital currency purchases and PowerBank no longer intends to utilize Coinbase for this service. As of the date of this press release, no Bitcoin purchases have been made. (1) https://cryptoslate.com/analysts-predict-30-trillion-market-cap-for-tokenized-rwa-by-2034/ About Intellistake For additional information on the business of Intellistake please refer to https://www.intellistake.ai/ . Other Corporate Update: Shares to Solar Flow-Through Directors In addition, the Company has issued a total of 56,275 shares to certain former and current directors and officers of Solar Flow-Through Funds Ltd. (‚ÄúSFF‚Äù) These shares are issuable in connection with outstanding directors fees due to such directors or officers that were assumed as part of the acquisition of Solar Flow-Through Funds Ltd. (‚ÄúSFF‚Äù). Th
